title: devilstrip rise (official torrent)
description:
This is a special 4-track sample from Devilstrip's debut album Rise.These songs have been made freely available for your enjoyment, to get the rest of the album follow the links in the document enclosed in this file


Hailing from Akron, Ohio, Devilstrip epitomizes the "power trio" moniker. Melodic, heavy grooves dominate their recently released debut album, Ã¢â‚¬ËœRiseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢. With a classic hard-rock soul and alternative-rock sensibilities, the band delivers passionate, hard-driving performances in both the studio and on stage. The members of Devilstrip are fully committed to the mantra of "100% or nothing" in all that bears their name. This has earned them an ever-growing, rabid regional fan base and now gaining international recognition in the United Kingdom, South America, Australia and beyond.
